name: Caput Mundi
uniques: [+2 Culture] from every specialist [in this city]
[10]% Food is carried over after population increases [in this city]
quote: Civilizations have rose and fell for centuries, but we do not intend to fall, for we have witnessed the mistakes of our ancestors and learnt. We are the Caput Mundi, Capital of the World, a shining beacon of civilization upon this desolate world.

civilopediaText.text: Capitalia is one of the few surviving cities of old, boasting a population of several hundred thousands, it is one of the largest and greatest cities in the wasteland.
Situated upon the vital chokepoint between Caesar's Crimson Legion and Hexlock, Capitalia must juggle a balance of diplomacy and deterrence to ensure their independence.

name: The Bastion
quote: A great monolithic structure overlooking our city, it is truly a masterpiece produced by the finest engineers and architectures we have. The Bastion will provide us a stronghold in the event of a foreign invasion, and in times of peace, jobs for the masses and a symbol of our power and prosperity.
